messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Tv question
messages.msgSnippet: ... Well,  in my family...the past 2 Thanksgiving were at my s-i-l s....and I could relate to the not enjoying it because TV was the star of the day....that
messages.messageBody:
> I wonder....
> or could it be that Thanksgiving doesn't usually require as much energy as
> xmas? (shopping, decorating.. .all that).
>
Well, in my family...the past 2 Thanksgiving were at my s-i-l's....and I
could relate to the not enjoying it because TV was "the star" of the
day....that is, garnered prominent attention. And at Christmas, more
mingling, story-telling, catching up ....no TV. And it never seems enough
time to really 'catch up'...so I wouldn't say the lack of 'stories' is part
of it for our family.
